long_description: Even though the women's Gregory J23 Pack is small in appearance, it's more than capable of carrying heavier loads on your next day hike. Women-specific design features an updated CrossFlo(TM) suspension. Panel-loading access to main compartment. Interior sleeve with port for hydration reservoir (sold separately); 2 exterior stretch water-bottle pockets. The Gregory J23 Pack features an exterior zippered top pocket with key clip.
short_description: Even though the women's Gregory J23 Pack is small in appearance, it's more than capable of carrying heavier loads on your next day hike.
